Name: FH-927-QU-ITP007 - AGL Removal of Luminaire, Installation of Shallow Cans and Luminaire Installation - Rev 0
Prompting Name: ITP007 - AGL Removal of Luminaire, Installation of Shallow Cans and Luminaire Installation

Name: Frequency - Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the latest and complete set of drawings
Reference Documents - IFC Drawings Appendix K - AGL Specification
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency - Prior to commencing any activities
Acceptance Criteria - All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP.
Reference Documents - PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity - Site and Office Inspection
Acceptance Criteria - All materials shall be proven to meet contractual requirements prior to acceptance.
Record of conformity - Datasheet/ Material Submission
2.0 - Removal of AGL Luminaires and installation of Foundation (All light types)
Acceptance Criteria - Surveyor to confirm location of AGL with IFC drawings and confirm alignment of luminaires.

○ Existing lights shall be reinstated following the overlay works in their existing location and at their existing orientation utilising the survey data captured prior to their removal before the overlay works commencing.
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031, GHD-DD-SPC-002 Section 3.19.1
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that the light to be removed corresponds to project drawings and documentation.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Sub-Contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - Remove existing light and AGL cables from conduits as per Sub-Contractor ITC for the Methods 1 and 2.
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031 Sub-Contractor ITC
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Sub-Contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - Prior to commencement of removal, the subcontractor shall ensure that the light has been isolated from power.
Reference Documents - APAM Electrical Isolation Standards
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Sub-Contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - Core pavement to required depth as per subcontractor ITC for relevant Method.
○ Existing AGL secondary cables removed after coring.
Reference Documents - AGL Subcontractor ITC CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Subcontractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - As required, core holes and luminaires to be safeguarded to allow for placement of asphalt with a Blanking plate.
Record of conformity - This Signed ITP & AGL Sub-Contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - After removal of the light, the subcontractor must ensure that the light number and position is recorded and stored accordingly for re-installation.
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Sub-Contractor ITC

Acceptance Criteria - Existing lights shall be reinstated following the overlay works in their existing location and at their existing orientation utilising the survey data captured prior to their removal before the overlay works commencing.
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031, GHD-DD-SPC-002 Section 3.19.1
Acceptance Criteria - Core pavement to required depth as per subcontractor ITC for relevant Method and Section 3.19.3 of Specifications GHD-DD-SPC-002.
○ Remove asphalt core and remove blanking plate.
Reference Documents - AGL Subcontractor ITC CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031, GHD-DD-SPC- 002
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Subcontractor ITC
1) Re-instated Light Location is to be picked up by survey as per Section 3.19.1 of Specifications GHD-DD-SPC-002
2) Secondary cable and earthing are to be places in Slot cuts
3) Reinstall existing light and reconnect secondary cable and terminate earth on light base as per Sections 3.12.4 and 3.19.3 of Specifications GHD-DD-SPC-002
1) Re-instated Light Location is to be picked up by survey as per Section 3.19.1 of Specifications GHD-DD-SPC-002
2) Reinstall existing light and reconnect the existing secondary cable and connector as per Sections 3.12.4 and 3.19.3 of Specifications GHD-DD-SPC-002
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031 Sub-Contractor ITC
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & AGL Sub-Contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - A jig must be used to install, locate and level the inset light unit base in position in the core hole and maintain the base in position during the curing of the epoxy grout.
○ Ensure correct light is installed in correct position and rotation as per the IFC drawings, this ITP and ITC
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031, GHD-DD-SPC-002 Section 3.19.6
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & Sub- contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - Light illuminates correctly (aiming, orientation, existing colour) as per existing photometric specs
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD- AD-L00-DR- EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031 GHD-DD-SPC-002 Section 3.19.6 MOS 139
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & Sub- contractor ITC
Acceptance Criteria - Termination as per IFC and testing requirements of AS/NZ 3000
Reference Documents - CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0003 to CP1024-GHD-AD-L00-DR-EE-0031, GHD-DD-SPC-002 Section 3.19.6 AS/NZ 3000
Record of conformity - This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITC
